name: Namango Web Development
tagline: Professional Service Provider You Can Trust
description: Namango was founded by Linc Broad, Jenna Floryna and John Franklin, three best friends since they attended UCLA. They have been making websites since early years and now are of the most skilled developers. Together they have delivered over 100 projects at Namango, and now they have a bigger crew to bring even more stunning visual effects to the table.
